|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MT29F1G08ABBEAH4-IT:E; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC128M16IP-DI; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337;QCA8337-AL3C, PK646LGL, 1646, TAIWAN; |wan_ports = <!-- 1 --> |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, VHT80+80, LACP, Link Aggregation, DFS (master), |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Qorvo (RFMD);RFPA5218;3Q, WRJA;4; ,,, 5GHz RF Power Amplifier;RFMD;RFPA5542;PA5542, 011D;4; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac

|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = 800 |rad1n = 600 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== <!-- {{FCC ST|02/06/2019}} --> <small>The radio IDs are not legible in the FCC photos but both are assumed to be QCA9984. Pads for a Mini PCIe socket are present but unpopulated in the FCC photos. The [[D-Link DWL-8620APE rev A1]] is internally identical but has four external antennas. It later received its own FCC ID.</small>
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:DWL-8620AP Side.png| File:DWL-8620AP Front.png| File:DWL-8620AP Back.png| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
